title: The Vixen is Attacked - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Yuri
tags: Ancient China   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Interdimensional Travel   Magic   Past Plays a Big Role   System Administrator   World Hopping
author: 白日曦
description:
System: You’ve received a series of tasks, enter into various worlds to attack the protagonist, do a good job! 

Hua Diewu: Don’t worry! Seducing men is a piece of cake for me. 

System: No, you are going to seduce the heroine this time. 

Hua Diewu: The first task is a pretty lady, I’m a little shy. 

Hua Diewu used her beauty strategy, but she turned out to be extremely upright, indifferent to her beauty (rou) and color (ti), cry cry. 

Later… Su Luoyan said: It’s really fragrant.>
